actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Planning Act to extend the authority for financial assistance to the States for water resources planning.

summary.text: Removes, under the Water Resources Planning Act, the termination date presently to expire with fiscal year 1976 for the existing program of Federal assistance to the States to finance water resources planning.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Planning Act to extend the authority for financial assistance to the States for water resources planning.
